Key Match Events: Jalen Johnson scored 29 points for the Hawks
Trae Young had a double-double with 23 points and 12 assists
Brandon Ingram scored 32 points for the Pelicans
Miscellaneous Highlights: Atlanta scored the first seven points of the third quarter to take a six-point lead
The Hawks increased their lead to 11 points before the Pelicans twice closed within five
Johnson scored seven points during a 14-0 run that put the Hawks well ahead
Others: Dyson Daniels and Larry Nance Jr. scored 16 points and 14 points, respectively, for the Hawks
Zaccharie Risacher and Garrison Mathews added 11 apiece for the Hawks
Jordan Hawkins chipped in 19 points and Brandon Boston Jr. and Jamal Cain each finished with 14 for the Pelicans
The Pelicans played without star forward Zion Williamson (hamstring)
